Term 1 (basic)
: - Definition 1
  - Definition 2
  - Definition 3

Term 1 (nested)
: - Definition 1
    - Sub 1
    - Sub 2
  - Definition 2
  - Definition 3
    - Sub 1
    - Sub 2

Term 1 (triple)
: - Definition 1
    - Sub 1
      - Pub 1

Term 2 (basic)
: 1. Definition 1
  2. Definition 2
  3. Definition 3
